Detailed Description

APIs of events and exceptions.

Function Documentation

◆ MV_CC_RegisterAllEventCallBack()

MV_CAMCTRL_API int __stdcall MV_CC_RegisterAllEventCallBack ( IN void *  handle,
IN   void__stdcall *cbEvent)(MV_EVENT_OUT_INFO *pEventInfo, void *pUser,
IN void *  pUser 
)

Register event callback, which is called after the device is opened.

Parameters
handle[IN] Device handle
cbEvent[IN] Callback function for receiving events
pUser[IN] User data
Returns
Return MV_OK on success, and return Error Code on failure
Note
Call this API to set the event callback function to get the event information, e.g.ï¼Œsacquisition and exposure.
This API is not supported by CameraLink device.

◆ MV_CC_RegisterEventCallBackEx()

MV_CAMCTRL_API int __stdcall MV_CC_RegisterEventCallBackEx ( IN void *  handle,
IN const char *  strEventName,
IN   void__stdcall *cbEvent)(MV_EVENT_OUT_INFO *pEventInfo, void *pUser,
IN void *  pUser 
)

Register single event callback, which is called after the device is opened.

Parameters
handle[IN] Device handle
strEventName[IN] Event name
cbEvent[IN] Callback function for receiving event information
pUser[IN] User data
Returns
Return MV_OK on success, and return Error Code on failure
Note
Call this API to set the event callback function to get the event information, e.g., acquisition and exposure.
This API is not supported by CameraLink device.
Examples
Events.cpp.

◆ MV_CC_RegisterExceptionCallBack()

MV_CAMCTRL_API int __stdcall MV_CC_RegisterExceptionCallBack ( IN void *  handle,
IN   void__stdcall *cbException)(unsigned int nMsgType, void *pUser,
IN void *  pUser 
)

Register Exception Message CallBack, call after open device.

Parameters
handle[IN] Device handle
cbException[IN] Callback function to receive exception messages
pUser[IN] User data
Returns
Return MV_OK on success, and return Error Code on failure.
Note
Call this API after the device is opened by MV_CC_OpenDevice() . When device is exceptionally disconnected, the exception message can be obtained from callback function. For disconnected GigE device, first call MV_CC_CloseDevice() to shut down the device, and then call MV_CC_OpenDevice() to reopen the device.
Macro Definition Value Description
MV_GIGE_EXCEPTION_DEV_DISCONNECT 0x00008001 Device disconnected.
Examples
ReconnectDemo.cpp.
